Nadciśnienie tętnicze, choroba niedokrwienna serca, choroba zwyrodnieniowa kręgosłupa, jaskra, LBBB, stan po mastektomii lewostronnej (1996r.), stan po lewostronnej resekcji płuca z powodu ca (2012r).\nW dniu przyjęcia : miejscami czas, bez zaburzeń mowy, objawy opanowane nieobecne, bez odchyleń ze strony nn.\nOsłuchowo: szmer i nastacie mn 4 kk. prawidłowe, bez ataksji i zaburzeń czucia, obj. patologiczne nieobecne, chód na niewiele poszerzonej podstawie. Chwiejny, tandemowy niemozliwy.\nPacjentka z wieloletnim wywiadem nadciśnienia tętniczego, choroby niedokrwiennej serca.\nPacjentka 93-letnia po lobektomii dolnej lewej w 2012 - brak dokumentacji, ostatnia kontrola TK 09.2022 - wówczas bez płynu w opłucnej, w przeszłości kilka razy odciągano płynu z jamy opłucnej lewej, po raz pierwszy opisywanego w sierpniu 2023- na podstawie wykonanego",

positive: The report accurately extracts most patient demographic details, including name, date of birth, age, PESEL and address.  Many of the visit dates were included correctly although some were redundant. The report also included most of the medical history information correctly. The diagnosis information was mostly accurate. The medications and the recommendations were well extracted. The report also got most of the 'wydano skierowanie na' items.
negative: The report includes some visit dates that were not included in the provided document. There were also extra diagnoses added that were not present in the document. Several diagnoses are duplicated and there are irrelevant diagnoses mentioned like 'Poliartralgia' and 'ADKP. 1947'. Some of the extracted 'Zastosowane leczenie' from the document is not actually treatment but rather 'procedures', and there are some elements of the treatment list that were not included. There was an omission of one 'Skierowano na' item. The 'wydano skierowanie' item was not accurately extracted.
